title: 05/04/2021 - HOUR 1 - Rodgers, 49ers
itunes:title: 05/04/2021 - HOUR 1 - Rodgers, 49ers
description:
The trust has been lost between Aaron Rodgers and the Packers

The 49ers locker room might not have accepted Mac Jones

Terry Bradshaw's comments on the Aaron Rodgers situation


Guest: Mark Schlereth
